# oh-my-ag Official Docs

> Official multi-agent orchestration documentation for Antigravity, focused on practical guides for setup, operations, and delivery workflows.

This file follows the llms.txt format and curates the web Guide section of oh-my-ag documentation.
Use English links for default parsing and Korean links when the user context is Korean.
All links point to the published documentation on GitHub Pages.

## Guide (English)

- [Usage Guide](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/en/guide/usage/): Full usage guide including workflows, dashboard operations, and troubleshooting.
- [Existing Project Integration](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/en/guide/integration/): Non-destructive integration flow for adding oh-my-ag to an existing Antigravity project.
- [Central Registry for Multi-Repo Setup](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/en/guide/central-registry/): Versioned central registry operations and safe PR-based consumer sync.
- [Use Case: Single Skill](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/en/guide/single-skill/): Fast path for focused single-domain work with clear acceptance criteria.
- [Use Case: Multi-Agent Project](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/en/guide/multi-agent-project/): Coordination model for cross-domain parallel delivery.
- [Use Case: Bug Fixing](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/en/guide/bug-fixing/): Reproduce-diagnose-fix-regress loop with severity-based escalation.
- [Use Case: Dashboard Monitoring](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/en/guide/dashboard-monitoring/): Runbook for operating terminal/web dashboards with actionable signals.

## Guide (Korean)

- [사용 가이드](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/ko/guide/usage/): 예시, 워크플로우, 대시보드 운영, 문제 해결을 포함한 전체 사용 가이드.
- [기존 프로젝트 통합](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/ko/guide/integration/): 기존 Antigravity 프로젝트에 안전하고 비파괴적으로 통합하는 절차.
- [중앙 레지스트리 멀티 레포 설정](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/ko/guide/central-registry/): 멀티 레포 환경에서 중앙 레지스트리를 버전 기반으로 운영하는 방법.
- [유즈케이스: 단일 스킬](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/ko/guide/single-skill/): 단일 도메인 작업을 빠르게 처리하는 실전 흐름.
- [유즈케이스: 멀티 에이전트 프로젝트](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/ko/guide/multi-agent-project/): 복합 도메인 기능을 병렬로 전달하기 위한 조율 흐름.
- [유즈케이스: 버그 수정](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/ko/guide/bug-fixing/): 심각도 기반 버그 대응과 회귀 방지 루프.
- [유즈케이스: 대시보드 모니터링](https://first-fluke.github.io/oh-my-ag/ko/guide/dashboard-monitoring/): 터미널/웹 대시보드 운영과 이상 신호 대응 런북.
